General.Name: Chengdu Zhimingda Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Chengdu Zhimingda Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of military embedded computer module products in China. It's products portfolio include data acquisition module, signal processing blocks, data processing module, communication exchange, interface control, high speed storage enclosure, graphic image module, and high reliability power supply module. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Zhimingda Digital Equipment Co., Ltd. Chengdu Zhimingda Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
